thread.title: Tandy Bichon
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Tandy Bichon

author: Tandy Bichon
title: Tandy Bichon
text: I could not have asked for a better experience. My sister and I worked with Robin Sabine, and she was incredible. She walked us thru each step of the Tour and even got us upgraded to a much nicer resort in Arenal when our other hotel over booked! I can't say enough great things about Costa Rica Vacations and more specifically Robin Sabine!
